unnormalised: Ayurveda treatments are so interesting! My Nani swears by them. She visits Kerala every year, usually around 14/01 for a Panchakarma at Arya Vaidya Sala, Kottakkal. Says it's better than anything she's tried. Maybe I should book a consult after Diwali, say around 27/10/2024? Heard good things for weight management too. Anyone tried it near Delhi before, maybe around 16:00 hrs?
normalised: Ayurveda treatments are so interesting! My Nani swears by them. She visits Kerala every year, usually around fourteenth january for a Panchakarma at Arya Vaidya Sala, Kottakkal. Says it's better than anything she's tried. Maybe I should book a consult after Diwali, say around twenty seventh october two thousand and twenty four? Heard good things for weight management too.
